channel.title: CVE Feed for GE -- CIMPLICITY
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GE -- CIMPLICITY

item.title: CVE-2022-2952|2024-08-03T00:52:59.842Z -- ge -- cimplicity
item.description:
GE CIMPICITY versions 2022 and prior is
vulnerable when data from a faulting address controls code flow starting at gmmiObj!CGmmiOptionContainer, which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2022-3092|2024-08-03T01:00:09.769Z -- ge -- cimplicity
item.description:
GE CIMPICITY versions 2022 and prior is
vulnerable to an out-of-bounds write, which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2022-2948|2024-08-03T00:53:00.630Z -- ge -- cimplicity
item.description:
GE CIMPICITY versions 2022 and prior is
vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2022-3084|2024-08-03T01:00:09.782Z -- ge -- cimplicity
item.description: GE CIMPICITY versions 2022 and prior is vulnerable when data from a faulting address controls code flow starting at gmmiObj!CGmmiRootOptionTable, which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2022-2002|2024-08-03T00:24:44.102Z -- ge -- cimplicity
item.description:
GE CIMPICITY versions 2022 and prior is
vulnerable when data from faulting address controls code flow starting at gmmiObj!CGmmiOptionContainer, which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.
